about_the_game:
Dive into a world of nostalgia and thrilling adventure with "Himiko's Journey," a retro roguelike deckbuilding game that captures the essence of classic gaming while giving you a relaxed but challenging space.

Key Features:


🎲 Dice-Rolling Thrills: Embrace the unpredictability of each round as the roll of the dice determines your starting resources and card effects. Adapt to ever-changing circumstances and seize victory.

🃏 Over 100 Unique Cards: Craft your deck from a vast collection of over 80 unique cards, each with its own strategic twist. Build and adapt your deck as you progress through an ever-changing world. And there are more to come!

🕹️ Roguelike Challenge: Prepare for an exhilarating challenge where each death marks the beginning of a new adventure. Learn from your mistakes, grow stronger, and face evolving challenges in every playthrough.

🔮 Unique Mechanics: Master a range of captivating mechanics, including poison, frost, burn, dice rolling as well as summoning henchmen. Tailor your strategy to conquer your foes and uncover hidden treasures.



🏆 Unique Artefacts: Discover powerful artefacts that can shift the balance of power in your favor. Collect and harness their unique abilities to overcome even the toughest challenges.

🌟 Visuals That Captivate: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning world that combines retro aesthetics with modern design. Our handcrafted artwork and enchanting landscapes bring the game to life.

👾 A Passion Project: "Himiko's Journey" is a labor of love, born from a desire to invoke the same magical feelings experienced during classic gaming sessions. It's not about being the best game ever; it's about delivering a fun, enjoyable experience you'll return to time and time again.



Embark on an epic adventure, where every card you play, every decision you make, and every roll of the dice shapes your destiny. Will you conquer the challenges that lie ahead and emerge victorious on "Himiko's Journey"?

Get ready to rediscover the joy of gaming – add 'Himiko's Journey' to your Steam library today!

Key Features:


🎲 Dice-Rolling Thrills: Embrace the unpredictability of each round as the roll of the dice determines your starting resources and card effects. Adapt to ever-changing circumstances and seize victory.

🕹️ Roguelike Challenge: Prepare for an exhilarating challenge where each death marks the beginning of a new adventure. Learn from your mistakes, grow stronger, and face evolving challenges in every playthrough.

🔮 Unique Mechanics: Master a range of captivating mechanics, including poison, frost, burn, dice rolling as well as summoning henchmen. Tailor your strategy to conquer your foes and uncover hidden treasures.



🏆 Unique Artefacts: Discover powerful artefacts that can shift the balance of power in your favor. Collect and harness their unique abilities to overcome even the toughest challenges.

🌟 Visuals That Captivate: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning world that combines retro aesthetics with modern design. Our handcrafted artwork and enchanting landscapes bring the game to life.

Embark on an epic adventure, where every card you play, every decision you make, and every roll of the dice shapes your destiny. Will you conquer the challenges that lie ahead and emerge victorious on "Himiko's Journey"?

name: Himiko's Journey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: intel-i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nividia GTX 980
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: intel-i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nividia GTX 980
